snippet: In the coming weeks the Clinton Foundation, long Bill Clinton’s domain, will become the nerve center of Hillary Rodham Clinton’s increasingly busy public life.
abstract: Clinton Foundation, domain of Bill Clinton since its formation in 2001, will become the nerve center of Hillary Rodham Clinton's increasingly busy public life; Clinton and her staff will move into offices at foundation’s new headquarters in Midtown Manhattan, further intertwining the family's political, philanthropic and business ventures.

byline.original: By NICHOLAS CONFESSORE and AMY CHOZICK
byline.contributor: Lydia Polgreen contributed reporting, and Kitty Bennett contributed research.

lead_paragraph: In the coming weeks the Clinton Foundation, long Bill Clinton’s domain, will become the nerve center of Hillary Rodham Clinton’s increasingly busy public life.

headline.main: Unease at Clinton Foundation Over Finances and Ambitions
headline.print_headline: Unease at Clinton Foundation Over Finances and Ambitions
